languages.text: {n}Внезапно в теле одной из служительниц Омниссии раздается щелчок, и глаза ее широко распахиваются. Судорога пробегает по худым конечностям, заставляя Торбальда схватиться за оружие. Губы изгибаются дугой, и с них срывается одно слово:{/n} "Ярмо!"

{n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно в теле одной из служительниц Омниссии раздается щелчок, и глаза ее широко распахиваются. Судорога пробегает по худым конечностям, заставляя Торбальда схватиться за оружие. Губы изгибаются дугой, и с них срывается одно слово:{/n} "Ярмо!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

{n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

{n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

{n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

{n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

{n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

languages.text: {n}突然之间，你听到其中一位技术神甫的身体发出了“咔嚓”一声。她瞪大了眼睛，憔悴的肢体不住地痉挛着，这样的异状让索巴德握紧了武器。她的嘴唇扭曲成一条弯曲的线，强行挤出了两个字。{/n}“圣枷！”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，你听到其中一位技术祭司的身体发出了“咔嚓”一声。她瞪大了眼睛，憔悴的肢体不住地痉挛着，这样的异状让索巴德握紧了武器。她的嘴唇扭曲成一条弯曲的线，强行挤出了两个字。{/n}“圣枷！”

languages.text: {n}Soudain, vous entendez un déclic dans le corps de l'une des technoprêtresses, qui ouvre grand les yeux. Un spasme secoue ses membres décharnés, et Thorbald empoigne son arme par réflexe. Les lèvres de la femme se tordent pour prononcer deux mots :{/n} « Le Joug ! »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, vous entendez un déclic dans le corps de l'une des technoprêtresses, qui ouvre grand les yeux. Un spasme secoue ses membres décharnés, et Thorbald empoigne son arme par réflexe. Les lèvres de la femme se tordent pour prononcer deux mots :{/n} « Le Joug ! »

languages.text: {n}突然、技術司祭のひとりの体内でカチッという音が聞こえ、彼女の目が大きく見開かれる。激しく痙攣する痩せ細った四肢をを見たトールバルドは、武器を握りしめる。彼女は歪な笑みを浮かべ、ある言葉を搾りだした。{/n}「くびき！」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、技術司祭のひとりの体内でカチッという音が聞こえ、彼女の目が大きく見開かれる。激しく痙攣する痩せ細った四肢をを見たトールバルドは、武器を握りしめる。彼女は歪な笑みを浮かべ、ある言葉を搾りだした。{/n}「くびき！」

languages.text: {n}De repente, oyes un chasquido que proviene del cadáver de una de las tecnosacerdotisas y sus ojos se abren de par en par. Un espasmo sacude sus miembros enjutos, lo que provoca que Thorbald agarre su arma. Sus labios se tuercen en una línea enmarañada que espeta dos palabras:{/n} «¡El Yugo!».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, oyes un chasquido que proviene del cadáver de una de las tecnosacerdotisas y sus ojos se abren de par en par. Un espasmo sacude sus miembros enjutos, lo que provoca que Thorbald agarre su arma. Sus labios se tuercen en una línea enmarañada que espeta dos palabras:{/n} «¡El Yugo!».

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich hörst du in der Leiche einer der Techpriesterinnen ein Klicken, und ihre Augen öffnen sich weit. Ein Zittern fährt durch ihre hageren Glieder, so dass Thorbald seine Waffe umklammert. Ihre Lippen verziehen sich zu einer schiefen Linie, und sie presst zwei Wörter hervor:{/n} "Das Joch!"
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, you hear a click inside one of the Tech-Priests' bodies, and her eyes open wide. A spasm shakes her gaunt limbs, making Thorbald clutch his weapon. Her lips twist into a crooked line, forcing out two words:{/n} "The Yoke!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich hörst du in der Leiche einer der Techpriesterinnen ein Klicken, und ihre Augen öffnen sich weit. Ein Zittern fährt durch ihre hageren Glieder, so dass Thorbald seine Waffe umklammert. Ihre Lippen verziehen sich zu einer schiefen Linie, und sie presst zwei Wörter hervor:{/n} "Das Joch!"
